alert.note: Alert for Anchorage (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 3:45PM AKST until December 26 at 9:00PM AKST by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM AKST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Ice accumulations of a trace up to one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...Anchorage. * WHEN...Until 9 PM AKST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Be prepared for slippery roads. Slow down and use caution while driving. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing rain is expected through the evening. Temperatures will rise above freezing for parts of Anchorage as a south wind develops and the upper Hillside. Typically colder areas of east Anchorage up to Eagle River and the Glenn Highway corridor are the most likely spots for freezing rain.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
